review:
Dr.Parthasarathy is the  first and best choice for our entire running team.
The way he assures and motivates a person  is the reason for the speedy recovery.
His approach and recovery plans are always targetted  to the root of the problem not just treating the symptoms 
We respect him for his dedication and commitment.
I had recommended  many of my friends and all of them share the same experience.
He is a highly sort after Doctor.
Yet gives time to reassure and build confidence in  the paitent.
